content: मध्यम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मध्ये मवः म] {@--1@} Being or standing in the middle, middle, central; पितुः पदं मध्यममुत्पतंती <ls>V. 1. 19</ls>; मध्यमे पल <ls>Ki. 9. 2</ls>; so मध्यमलोकपालः, मध्यमपदं मध्यमरेखा <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--2@} Intermediate, intervening. {@--3@} Middling, of a middling condition or quality, mediocre; as in उत्तमाधममध्यम. {@--4@} Middling, moderate; तेन मध्यमशक्तिनिमित्राणि स्थापितान्यतः <ls>R. 17. 58.</ls> {@--5@} Middle-sized. {@--6@} Neither youngest nor oldest, the middleborn (as a brother); प्रणमति पितरौ वां मध्यमः पांडवोऽयं <ls>Ve. 5. 26.</ls> {@--7@} Impartial, neutral. {@--8@} Mean (in <ab>astr.</ab>). {@--9@} Belonging to the meridian. --मः {@--1@} The fifth note in music. {@--2@} A particular musical mode. {@--3@} The mid-land country; see मध्यदेश. {@--4@} The second person (in grammar). {@--5@} A neutral sovereign; धर्मोत्तरं मध्यममाश्रयंते <ls>R. 13. 7.</ls> {@--6@} The governor of a province. --मा {@--1@} The middle finger. {@--2@} A marriageable girl, one arrived at the age of puberty. {@--3@} The pericarp of a lotus. {@--4@} One of the classes of heroines (Nāyikās) in poetic compositions, a woman in the middle of her youth; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>S. D. 100.</ls> {@--5@} A central blossom. --मं {@--1@} The middle. {@--2@} The waist.
